What to Know About North-West University Student Portal

North-West University, Student Portal allows formal and prospective students in the College to create an account or log in to perform certain academic actions at ease including Course Registration, Fees Payment, Exam Results, Admission Online Application, Application Status, Acceptance Fees Payment, Transcript, Timetable, Academic Calander, Extra Credit Hours, Deferment of Admission and so much more.

North-West University, Student Portal

Student Login portal of the North-West University, is accessible as follows;

To access the North-West University (NWU) Student Portal, you can follow these steps:

  1. Open your web browser and go to the official website of North-West University. The URL is https://www.nwu.ac.za/.
  2. On the NWU website, look for a section dedicated to students. It may be labeled as “Students,” “Student Portal,” or something similar. You can usually find this section in the main menu or the homepage.
  3. Click on the appropriate link to access the student portal. It may be labeled as “Student Portal Login,” “myNWU,” or similar.
  4. You will be directed to the login page of the NWU Student Portal. Here, you will need to enter your login credentials. These credentials are usually provided to you by the university when you enroll or register as a student. Typically, you will need to enter your student number or username and a password.
  5. Once you have entered your login information, click on the “Login” or “Sign In” button to proceed.
  6. If your login details are correct, you should be logged into the NWU Student Portal. You will then have access to various features and resources provided by the portal, such as course registration, class schedules, grades, financial information, and more.

North-West University, Student Portal | Check Now

To view the portal, you will need your North-West University, Student Login ID and Password respective.

  • Go to the North-West University, Login Page
  • Log in with your Login ID and Password,
  • Click on the Submit or Login button.

You should be redirected to your official portal where you can access all the information you need.
